title: The Sheikh's Royal Announcement
description: From discovering his secret heirTo claiming his Cinderella bride!When King Kadir Al Marara finds out he has a four-year-old son, nothing can keep him away! He immediately boards his private jet for a surprise reunion with the boy’s unsuspecting mother, Caitlin.Shocked, Caitlin realizes she’d misjudged Kadir. Now he’s offering to transform her ordinary life to one of opulence…as his queen! As Caitlin struggles to resist the scorching chemistry still raging between them, the world awaits an extraordinary royal announcement…USA TODAY Bestselling Author
author: Sharon Kendrick
